title: 11/21: Thanksgiving Day Previews, Rest of Season Outlooks (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
A lot to get to on a busy show so of course we have to talk about Kickers (2:40)! Should you drop or hold Harrison Butker and Greg Zuerlein through their byes? We've got news and notes (5:18) including a look at the TB offense without O.J. Howard and some last-minute buy low (12:50) and sell high (13:53) candidates ... Some Fantasy scenarios we're interested in seeing unfold (15:51) including Rob Gronkowski's return to the NE offense, LeSean McCoy with good matchups and Aaron Rodgers' TDs. We also discuss what we're thankful for in Fantasy (22:24), read your emails (27:15) and do some Regulating Part One (30:00) ... ATL-NO (31:00), CHI-DET (39:40), WAS-DAL (43:32) plus a Thursday FanDuel lineup (48:40), listener tweets (49:35) and Fantasy Regulators Part Two (53:00) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: We're previewing the Thanksgiving games, giving rest of season outlooks for Rob Gronkowski, Aaron Rodgers and others, doing some Fantasy Regulating and answering listener questions.
